>hello everyone who can help.
>
>i need to know if their are any groups i can join that basicly 
>reenact the famous samurai battles and wear real armer and things 
>because i would just like to have a view of what it was like to 
>march into battle. i just want to have the experience first hand of 
>what i have come to love.
>
>so if you have info please let me in on it. it is my life long dream.
>
Don't know about any SCA events, there are a number of events 
reenacted in Japan. Not a reenactment really but  one famous festival 
is  this:

http://web-japan.org/atlas/festivals/fes06.html
